name: Tint
short_description:
Tint is a self-service platform helping brands aggregate, curate and display
social feeds in their websites and social networks.
long_description:
Our vision is to help brands drive deeper engagement with their audience by
allowing them to integrate any social feeds into any of their digital
properties. Tint (formerly Hypemarks) is a self-service platform that helps
brands aggregate, curate, and display any any social feeds onto their websites,
FB pages, mobile apps, retail displays, and event walls. Over 20,000 brands
trust Tint today after 8 months of launch, and our company hit profitability in
3 months.
